title: [Mac]First time, and the launcher does not start DL at all! Any solution?
body:
When I checked the Monitor, I thought it was just not responding, maybe because some bug. But when I open the log file, I found THIS below, which shows that it's stop responding because a single file is miss, which indicates the files need to download. ONE SINGLE FILE!!!!!

Then I used "ping l3cdn.riotgames.com" to test my network, it seems not my problem. Though there are many pkg missed, a connection stable enough for file transfer can be established.

Now the file missed is "filelist.versioninfo", can I copy form somewhere else?

I really hope that you Riot guys can provide a dmg or something which include the full content of the game, which can run without patch. Even need to re-download after every patch is OK. Because this can avoid many unexpected issues.








//the following are copied out of the log file


(  DEBUG)[22:47:58.000] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::HTTPConnection(HRESULT &, const std::string, unsigned short, int, bool, const char *): (http://l3cdn.riotgames.com)
(  DEBUG)[22:47:58.000] HRESULT RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::Connect(): (http://l3cdn.riotgames.com)
(   USER)[22:47:58.000] bool RADS::UserKernel::GetVersionInfo(const std::string &, std::vector &): Error while opening file "/Applications/League of Legends.app/Contents/LoL/RADS/system/filelist.versioninfo" for reading.

(  DEBUG)[22:47:58.000] HRESULT RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile(const std::string &, const std::string &, RADS::Common::IGetFileProgressCallback *const, const bool, const bool, bool, std::vector *): ("/releases/Maclive/system/filelist.versioninfo", "/Applications/League of Legends.app/Contents/LoL/RADS/system/temp/filelist.versioninfo", RETRY, 0x00000000)
(  ERROR)[22:50:11.000] HRESULT RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile(const std::string &, const std::string &, RADS::Common::IGetFileProgressCallback *const, const bool, const bool, bool, std::vector *): perform request failed with code 28
(  ERROR)[22:50:11.000] HRESULT RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile(const std::string &, const std::string &, RADS::Common::IGetFileProgressCallback *const, const bool, const bool, bool, std::vector *): Retrying after failed attempt 1
(  ERROR)[22:52:42.000] HRESULT RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile(const std::string &, const std::string &, RADS::Common::IGetFileProgressCallback *const, const bool, const bool, bool, std::vector *): perform request failed with code 7
(  ERROR)[22:52:42.000] HRESULT RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile(const std::string &, const std::string &, RADS::Common::IGetFileProgressCallback *const, const bool, const bool, bool, std::vector *): Retrying after failed attempt 2
(  ERROR)[22:55:13.000] HRESULT RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile(const std::string &, const std::string &, RADS::Common::IGetFileProgressCallback *const, const bool, const bool, bool, std::vector *): perform request failed with code 7
(  ERROR)[22:55:13.000] HRESULT RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile(const std::string &, const std::string &, RADS::Common::IGetFileProgressCallback *const, const bool, const bool, bool, std::vector *): Failed on /releases/Maclive/system/filelist.versioninfo
(  ERROR)[22:55:13.000] HRESULT RADS::UserKernel::Application::DownloadFiles(bool, bool &, bool &): Failed to download the filelist.versioninfo file. Make sure you are connected to the internet: (0xc1e90004)
(  DEBUG)[22:55:13.000] HRESULT RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::Disconnect(): ()
(   USER)[22:55:13.000] bool RADS::UserKernel::GetVersionInfo(const std::string &, std::vector &): Error while opening file "/Applications/League of Legends.app/Contents/LoL/RADS/system/filelist.versioninfo" for reading.

(   USER)[22:55:13.000] HRESULT RADS::UserKernel::Application::VerifyFiles(bool, bool &, bool &): Copying over new and updated files.

(   USER)[22:55:13.000] HRESULT RADS::UserKernel::Application::VerifyFiles(bool, bool &, bool &): Updating current UserKernel's version information.

(  DEBUG)[22:55:13.000] HRESULT RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run(): Terminating after SelfUpdate.

(   USER)[22:55:13.000] int Riot::GameMain(int, const char **): Unspecified error occurred.

replies.body: Are you using the legacy or the normal client?  If you have a poor or weak connection then your download could become corrupt or disable you from reaching our servers.  As a first step, it's really important to make sure that your connection is stable so our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide would be a solid step.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help configure your firewall as well as restore your client to a fresh state if you do have missing and corrupt files.  Let me know how that works out for you, and we can go from there if needed.
